hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | while read file_path; do if [[ -f "$file_path" ]]; then if [[ "$file_path" == *.sol ]]; then if command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1; then forge fmt "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; else bunx prettier --write "$file_path" --ignore-unknown 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi; done
jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | grep -qE '\b(rm -rf|sudo|chmod 777|>\s*/dev/s)' && echo 'Warning: Potentially dangerous command detected' >&2 && exit 0 || exit 0

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | grep -qE '\.(env|secrets?|key|pem|crt)$|/\.(ssh|aws|config)/|node_modules/|dist/|build/' && echo 'Warning: Modifying sensitive or generated file' >&2 && exit 0 || exit 0
